name: Youtube URL
description:
There are many kinds of links to the video: ``` https://www.youtube.com/embed/UN8oLGBNXpE - is correct for iframe https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UN8oLGBNXpE http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UN8oLGBNXpE https://youtu.be/UN8oLGBNXpE ``` If we insert the first link in the iframe, it works, but another do not work.

Task:

Please write a function that converts the string in the correct format for the iframe.
